doc:
Debra Laws https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Debra_Laws 0 Debra Renee Laws (born September 10, 1956) is an American singer and actress from Houston, Texas. She is best known for her 1981 R/Soul ballad "Very Special". In her music career, she works closely with her siblings, Eloise Laws, Hubert Laws and Ronnie Laws, who are producers. Debra_Renee_Laws ( born September_10_,_1956 ) is an_American_singer_and_actress from Houston , Texas . She is_best_known for her_1981_R / Soul_ballad " Very_Special " . In her_music_career , she works closely with her_siblings , Eloise_Laws , Hubert_Laws and Ronnie_Laws , who are producers .
